name: Mana Flow, Flower Grow
description:
A mysterious garden lies before you, neglected but clinging to life.
Tend to the plots,  plant flowers, and keep an eye out for mysterious
enchantments as you restore it to its former glory.

Join Us!

The moon is full of buried treasures, and we at Moon Mole Games  will unearth them for you! 

We release new games often, follow us to be the first to play!

Twitter * Discord
